headline: Pentair to Attend the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference
summary: LONDON, October 27, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, will be attending the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on November 12th in Chicago, IL. President and Chief Executive Officer John L. Stauch and EVP and Chief Financial Officer, Bob Fishman, will present at 9:05 a.m. Central Time. Nick Brazis, incoming Chief Financial Officer, will participate in investor meetings.
